scripts.build: npm run preprocess:skip-if-no-csv && next build && node scripts/clean-build.js
scripts.preprocess:skip-if-no-csv: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const csvPath=path.join(process.cwd(),'..','策略報告','CSV');if(fs.existsSync(csvPath)){require('child_process').execSync('npm run preprocess',{stdio:'inherit'});}else{console.log('⚠ No CSV files found, skipping preprocessing. Using existing strategies.json from Git.');}"
